titleInfo.title: The Nile from the quarries of Toura

mods.abstract: Limestone quarries and Nile River at Tourna; ancient Egyptian limestone quarry (foreground); harbor and shore of the Nile River (background); "THE NILE, FROM THE QUARRIES OF TOURA. Frith" in black at bottom right corner of print and along bottom of print. (Original number unknown, print given 1997.5.27 based on information in accession record, M.K., M.R.J., 2/8/2013).

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
